inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

LLC, in pencil: [58190]; LRC, in pencil: [coll. André Barrier]
markings: LRC and on back, stamped in red: [AB]; LRC, stamped in blue: [EHA]
portfolio: Plate 583 from Les Bois du Monde Illustré
provenance: André Barrier, Lugt 70d (b. 1870), Paris. Unidentified collector: E.H.A. [stamp not in Lugt]. [Catherine E. Burns, Oakland, CA, until 1998; sold in March for $1, 200, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1998-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC below image, in pencil: [A Lepere]; on back, in pencil: [Combat dans la neige quai aux fleurs]
title: Combatting the Snow, Bridge of Flowers
